Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Really one of the best places for a night out in Amsterdam. Personal and really good food. Everything is fresh. Also the dessert was amazing! Thank you so much for the great night!!

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: One of the best restaurants I've eaten at! Everything was delicious. We had veal, but since they make everything from scratch ("no cans, no jars"), there is no paper menu and the options change daily. It was so flavourful and balanced, I ‚Ä¶

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: We had the most unforgettable evening here, over 4 hours chatting and eating in this cosy Greek/Turkish restaurant. It's wonderful that the owners really encourage you to stay as long as you like. The place doesn't have menus but the mezze they bring you is to die for! Amazing dessert too. √áok te≈üekk√ºr ederim! We will 100% be back soon

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Everything is delicious, super friendly service, cant wait to go back again, even the takeaway is superb, mmm mmm

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: We highly recommend this little cosy restaurant! Food was amazing, tasty and homemade üòä We had amazing time there! Thank you

Name: Mezebar Bodrum

We had a veal stew and I‚Äôm still dreaming about it. Prices are also very reasonable. Let Irma and Ihsan take care of you and come hungry!

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Lovely Turkish-Greek cuisine run by owners with a beautiful founding story. Highly recommended!

Name: Mezebar Bodrum

Name: Mezebar Bodrum

Review Text: Great Turkish cuisine! Smiling  service, casual atmosphere

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: A hidden pearl of Amsterdam! Every single dish absolutely delicious

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Fantastic. I cannot recommend highly enough. The food was fresh and delightful. The service was friendly, we felt at home instantly. And the prices were more than fair. Our table was mixed omnivore/vegetarian and they accommodated us all ‚Ä¶

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Amazing experience very warm hospitality. Nice and fresh food it was lovely. We definitely will come back

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Lovely people, amazing tasty and fresh food! It has a mix between Turkish and Greek options, with no menu but fresh plates prepared daily. Great value for money as well. Absolutely recommended!

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Great food and service, eaten in (mezes) and too away (chicken gyros). Awesome! Will be back already later this week

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: This place is fantastic all round - amazing delicious food, menu changes every day to ensure they use the freshest ingredients, they are happy to cater for vegans. The host is a beautiful happy soul who ensures you will never leave hungry!! Could not rate higher!

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Wonderful place! No nonsense real delicious, very reasonably priced food served and prepared by lovely people! One of my favorite places in Amsterdam!

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: The owners are so so nice!! The chef s food is awesome like the great meals your mother cooks for you..plus we added a fantastic Greek wine. What a nice evening we had!! Thank you..

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Incredibile Mediterranean food and really friendly service. The best place in the area!

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Simply fantastic! There is no fixed menu and all the food is freshl and homemade. Unique.

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text:
The only place I ate good in Amsterdam so far.
Eating good I mean good service, fresh food and fair price.

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: This restaurant is always amazing. We take all of our friends there. Today we called and asked for a six person Mezze to take away and collected it ourselves. Everything was amazing and our guests were very satisfied. The owners are lovely ‚Ä¶

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Absolutely, hands down, my favorite restaurant in Amsterdam. The owners, a Turkish man (Ihsan) & Greek woman (Irma), married couple, are the most incredible people with such warm hearts & a passion for life that carries over to the food ‚Ä¶

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: We didn‚Äôt expect that at all! It‚Äôs a real authentic restaurant, a mix of Dutch and Mediterranean (Turkish/Greek) atmosphere with super fresh and good food. The wine was very good as well and for a real democratic price. So far from all the hyped places you can find in Amsterdam!

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Exceptional food, remarkable hospitality, and cozy ambience. I didn‚Äôt even need to ask for a menu when I walked in. She just asked me if I wanted vegetarian or meat, and then proceeded to work magic on a takeaway box of deliciousness: ‚Ä¶

Name: Mezebar Bodrum

Review Text: Magic place! Owners are lovely people, they are so kind and dont‚Äôt mind to explain all the details of the dishes. The food is real fresh and delicious, best vegetarian restaurant by far and one of the best restaurants in Amsterdam.

Name: Mezebar Bodrum

Review Text: Everything was perfect! It's a great restaurant with tasty food!

Name: Mezebar Bodrum

Name: Mezebar Bodrum

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Cozy and warm restaurant. Great host. There is no menu. The chief can read your mind!

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Excellent place for a good mediterranean dinner with friends

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Great quality ingredients, many options to choose from, nice varying menu, great service, and cheap (price quality wise and for a place like Amsterdam..!)

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Lovely owners and great authentic food!

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Lovely service. Great food and cute (but deadly) cat

Name: Mezebar Bodrum

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Very warm and welcoming place with delicious turkish mezes. Owners are very sincere and spare time for you personally to make sure everything is okay. Prices are very reasonable. Reservation is needed at the busy evening hours since it is a ‚Ä¶

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Amazing food made with love. It is our go to place to eat in Amsterdam and is open till late. Surprisingly good cappuccino - ask for the secret cappuccino.

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Our favorite place in Amsterdam. We always take our visitors. Everyone loves it. If you‚Äôre in a hurry, they have schwarma and whatnot, but the best call is to eat the meze.  You‚Äôll be there for hours and you will love it.

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: I like mezes, tapas and overall Mediterranean cuisine. I have been to this restaurant twice. Both times, the food was fresh and the service was very personal. However, the bill is not very transparent. The first time, maybe because I was a ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Lovely atmosphere and the food is to die for, so yummy üòã

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Great place and great service and fantastic food!!!!!

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: This wonderful place is runned by the most delightful couple. It's where Amsterdam meets East Mediterranean/Turkey and lives happily ever after. It where my sister can have lamb and I can be the unexcused vegan. So for all you couples or ‚Ä¶

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: Sometimes it is the experience that draws you back. Mezebar is run by the most lovely couple in a cosy place surrounded by Turkish nostalgia and Greek music playing in the background. We ordered lamb, two ways. Slow cooked and lamb chops. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mezebar Bodrum
Review Text: This is exactly what you want on a rainy sundaynight. The hostess(ownerA) gave us a warm welcome, recommended good food and the greek housewine was delicieus. We had the mezza(small portions) made by ownerB . So good! When the Bill came the party got even better. Not to much for a good good meal.
